post.body: no, but I tend to prefer wading through the snow.
I'll bet I'll get to the fooling around in the snow someday, but today it's more important to do some thinking in the snow.
you have an emotional/spiritual balance kit? Shit, you could MARKET those...
the last link was this: http://www.thepoop.com/pooppantry/
try these sites: http://www.gourmetsleuth.com/moredogtreatrecipes.htm http://www.bullwrinkle.com/Assets/Recipes/Recipes.ht ...
while getting laid out there would be nice, I really just need the chance to recenter and find my balance.
ooh, there's a book on those but let me see if I can find the one I used online before.
I'm going to take the kids up to Hub2 and Co-wife's house today, get their help and take a long walk in the snow.
seriously? Wow.
ha ha. Not so much the kind of cracking that can be fixed with glue or tape.
not a lot, but enough. Apparently the roads are absolute crap.
I would make housecalls if I was a waxer. But only for you and a few select others...
I am going to get a lot more snow. Frustrating at times.
pretty high. At least 3500 but I think maybe more.
maybe you could do a less innocent venture for @RangerMonkey? And, y'know, just share it with all of us too?
you're pink, therefore you're clean?
I like that. Works for me. By the way, you should never doubt your gorgeous sweater. You look awesome in Aran wool.
@wash_ NO ONE should EVER doubt your existence.
so fucking disgusting I can't even finish one.
I got that bar for @RangerMonkey last year. I had one bite and hated admitting that it was actually good.
Really? Those mojito flavored beers are disgusting.
well, I am a little off in the head today...
was it from Vosges?
yay! Good.
you rock.
it's not particularly pungent, but rather painful. Damn dairy products and peppers in salsa...
lol, not too worried about... um... you... following me?
I take it to mean you are safe, in one piece, under a roof?
woo! I have shopping to do too... :D
I will recover my badassness.
http://twitpic.com/znpt - Awww... never!
my god, having an amp totally makes up for everything we discussed last night.
one of the things I want to do is use the click throughs to go to places I would have otherwise.
you are supportive and sympathetic. I may pick your brain later too.
I have a request for FetLife - is there a way I can see all of the ads on one page as I prep for a shopping spree?
I honestly don't much care whether they accept it or not, but we DO currently live in my mother's house.
yeah, yeah :P
the best person I know is @chrisorourke for that stuff
yes... yes it is. Although I had hoped to be a little more productive by this morning...
of course. Kinda like... nevermind.
ouchie.
I've had a headache (and neck and shoulders too) for days. NO forensics for me.
So I was homicidal yesterday. $500 of well organized beads? Scattered all over the living room floor. One of many reasons I'm cracking.
still snowing. Debating whether my sanity is worth the potentially icky drive. I'm perilously close to breakdown but theh roads suck.
HOLY CARP ON A STICK! I'm a favorite this week @CurvaceousDee's place! http://tinyurl.com/6ogp53
Morning tweeps. Lost "regular" internet last night, but still had IM. Weird, much?
drama exhausts me. Hoping for some face to face time for discussion soon.
still snowing off and on. Mostly flurries. Supposed to get a ton over the next few days though.
Good morning twitterverse. Time to buckle down and get Xmas presents made.
okay, really. I'm going to bed. Probably read for a bit then pass out into a ridiculously deep exhausted sleep.
downloading some more stuff from the place @teathededanu showed me. Sale. Hoping for progress.
The gassing has begun. Sorry, @RangerMonkey
So... ate a plate of nachos for dinner. Yummy. Will pay for it with major gut pain later, I'm sure.
alrighty... time to make mega supremely awesome nachos for dinner and then maybe do some more beading...
Oh, and I got my scholarship disbursement yesterday. Been paying bills like a mofo.
On one hand, I wish I had, but on the other... well, best to spill appropriately.
Oldest sister called. Almost spilled the beans about poly which would have resulted in mom knowing by the end of the day. Bah.
I got to sleep in today. :)
But only one episode. I'm tired.
Wrapping up a rather heated discussion and thinking @RangerMonkey's idea of watching an ep of Swingtown is fantastic.
